Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale-red pottery vessel, the fabric is grey in section, the interior is slightly grooved, the exterior is covered with a burnished cream-coloured slip and very faint traces of at least seven lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393406) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393406)
